overview:
Mr. Mandell is the CTO at Point Inside, the leading mobile shopper engagement platform and the first US company to bring large scale indoor mapping and navigation services to market in 2009.

Mandell has over 30 years of enterprise platform development experience and throughout his career he has built technology and teams that have created industry-changing companies. Most recently he was Senior VP of Product Engineering at Kaseya, Inc., responsible for the design, development and delivery of Kaseya’s core product suite. Previously he served as VP of Product Development and Operations at Authorize.Net and was the cofounder of Captura Software. Mr. Mandell is a graduate of both California State University – Chico and the University of Miami.
